name: Synthacer_Deluxe_Nights
description:
A lot of this games design is intended to be a screensaver piece, to be displayed somewhere. 

Two controls: Left and right(A and D) to steer your car. 
Escape to quit.

Credits:

Design:  Jack McClenaghan & Jacob Blanch.

Programming: Jack McClenaghan & Jacob Blanch.

Score: Composed by EchoSapphire.

Models:
Some models and shaders from Dustyroom's synthwave aesthetic pack. 
Sports cars from CERBERUSand IGIID .

3rd party scripts: Keijiro Takahashi's Reaktion plugin!

Fonts:
Lazer 84 by Juan Hodgson.
SF Alien Encounters by ShyFoundry.
